rules_text:
When Malicious Growth enters and at the beginning of your upkeep, put two +1/+1 counters on target land you control.
{1}{G}: Target land you control becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste and vigilance until end of turn. It's still a land.
flavor_text: [i]Nature is unwilling to give up more than she has already lost.[/i]
